\begingl[glneveryline={\EnglishGlossA,\EnglishGlossB}]
Having[] accepted[] two[] or[] three[] bowls[] full,[] having[] taken[] (them)[] away[] from[] there,[] (it)[] is[] to[] be[] shared[] together[] with[] (other)[] bhikkhus.[] This[] is[] the[] proper[] procedure[] here.[]
